intro: Climb higher, move faster, and never stop until you reach the peak.
description:
Experience the excitement of climbing to new heights in Only Up – Parkour Game! Explore low-poly worlds where every structure, platform, and obstacle tests your balance, agility, and reflexes. Along the way, reach checkpoints to collect lootboxes containing coins and special bonuses. Use parachutes to slow your fall, wings, or jetpacks to soar higher as you ascend through dynamic, moving platforms.

Key Features:
- Vertical Adventure – Climb unstable structures and balance on moving platforms across multiple locations.
- Diverse Locations – Explore 5 unique areas: city, desert, forest, military base, and space.
- Lootboxes & Boosters – Collect coins, parachutes, wings, and jetpacks to aid your ascent.
- Master Movement – Jump, climb, fly, and grab objects with precise control.
- Challenging Gameplay – Avoid dangerous falls that can send you back to the start.
- Continuous Progression – Rise through levels with increasing difficulty and thrilling obstacles.

Test your skills, conquer vertical challenges, and see how far you can climb. In Only Up – Parkour Game, every jump, every boost, and every movement brings you closer to the ultimate peak!
